name: Channeler
description: Evokers who channel magical energies to heal, protect, and enhance the natural world, serving as conduits for positive magical forces that restore balance and harmony.

Some channeling effects require maintaining focus, consuming mana over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum mana
Depleted mana causes penalties to channeling effectiveness and stability

Successful healing or protection of others restores a portion of mana

resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when channeling positive energies successfully, decreases when harmony is disrupted
mechanics: Increases by 20 when successfully channeling healing or protective energies
Increases by 15 per 10 seconds when maintaining harmony with natural forces
Decreases by 20 when channeling is disrupted or natural balance is harmed
Decreases by 15 per minute when not actively channeling positive energies
Can be spent to enhance healing effects or stabilize chaotic natural energies
Higher Arcane Focus increases healing power and natural energy attunement

resource_systems.name: Magical Resonance
resource_systems.description: Attunement to positive magical energies that enhances healing and protective powers
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when casting healing spells or restoring natural balance
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully healing others or protecting natural environments
Increases by 20 when restoring balance to magically disrupted areas
Decreases by 15 when healing attempts fail or natural harmony is broken
Decreases by 20 when forced to use destructive magic or harm living beings
Can be spent to amplify healing power or create protective barriers
Higher Magical Resonance increases the potency and range of healing magic

resource_systems.name: Harmonic Energy
resource_systems.description: Connection to the harmonious energies of life and nature
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when promoting life, healing, and natural harmony
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully restoring life or healing grievous wounds
Increases by 10 when establishing magical harmony in disrupted environments
Decreases by 15 when witnessing destruction of natural environments
Decreases by 10 when forced to use magic that disrupts natural harmony
Can be spent to perform powerful healing miracles or create sanctuaries of protection
At maximum Harmonic Energy, enter a state of perfect attunement with natural forces

effects: Can channel positive energies to heal wounds and cure ailments
Able to sustain healing channels to treat multiple targets simultaneously
Can redirect harmful energies into beneficial effects
Presence naturally promotes healing and recovery in the surrounding area
Can sense disturbances in life energy and natural harmony

class_mechanics.name: Natural Harmony
class_mechanics.description: Deep connection to the natural world and its energies
effects: Can tap into natural energy sources for enhanced magical power
Able to restore balance to magically disrupted environments
Can communicate with and soothe natural forces and elements
Presence calms turbulent natural phenomena and promotes growth
Can detect unnatural influences and corruptions in natural settings

class_mechanics.name: Protective Channeling
class_mechanics.description: Ability to create powerful protective barriers and wards
effects: Can channel energy into protective barriers that absorb or deflect harm
Able to create sanctuaries where healing and recovery are accelerated
Can establish wards that neutralize harmful magical effects
Presence strengthens existing protective magics and natural defenses
Can extend personal protections to cover allies and vulnerable areas

effects: Gains power bonuses when using magic to heal or protect rather than harm
Able to sense those in need of healing or protection at great distances
Can purify corrupted magical energies and restore their natural state
Presence naturally inspires hope and promotes healing in others
Can achieve miraculous healing effects when motivated by compassion

All healing effects within the sanctuary are doubled in effectiveness
Harmful spells and effects are significantly weakened within the area
Allies within gain resistance to negative status effects and energy drain

signature_abilities.name: Harmonic Convergence

mechanics: For 3 minutes, transform into a radiant embodiment of healing energy

lore: Channelers represent the most benevolent path an Evoker can take, having dedicated their magical prowess to healing, protection, and the restoration of natural harmony. These compassionate spellcasters have transcended ordinary evocation to become conduits for positive magical energies, capable of miraculous healing and the creation of powerful protective sanctuaries. The path to becoming a Channeler requires not only exceptional magical talent and energy control but also a genuine desire to help others and a deep connection to the natural world. Those who succeed find themselves capable of channeling healing energies of such potency they can restore even the most grievous injuries and purify corrupted magical environments. Channelers typically serve as healers in communities, protectors of natural sites, or members of organizations dedicated to maintaining magical balance. Many establish sanctuaries where their healing powers can benefit those in need, or travel to areas suffering from magical disruption to restore natural harmony. Some even become legendary figures whose mere presence is said to promote healing and growth in blighted areas. Their combination of powerful healing magic, protective abilities, and harmonizing influence makes them invaluable allies in conflicts against forces that corrupt or destroy, where their presence can sustain allies and neutralize harmful magical effects. Though they may lack the raw destructive power of more offense-focused spellcasters, the healing prowess and protective capabilities of Channelers make them perhaps the most valuable companions when facing threats that cause widespread harm or corruption.
